name: Lootbox Simulator 2K18+1
description:
Made in 48 hours for Butterscotch Shenanijam, theme? Wrenches 101.

Open loot-boxes to open loot-boxes even faster. Take an introductory course in the history of Wrenches and their applications.

Controls:

  • Click the wrench to spin it.
  • Spin the wrench to loosen the nut holding the goodies in the box.

Features:

  • All of the satisfaction of opening loot-boxes but with none of the addiction!
  • Get world-wide internet-connected stats. Submit to the leaderboards and view other's scores.
  • Learn about wrenches with Wikipedia snippets.
  • Get the real experience of trying, and failing to get the thing you wanted.
  • Definitely filled with bugs. Overflowing with them, probably. Definitely not finished.

Jam Achievements:

  • Totally Ethical Surprise Mechanics - The primary means of progressing through the game is lootboxes.
  • Maverick - Your team size is 1.

Crank those loot-boxes open again and again.
